extension.description:
JA Typo Plugin for Joomla! 2.5

Features:

Bonus Typography styles for your content. Choose styles right from your editor window. Colorful buttons, tables, forms, tags, headings, lists, badges, icons, CSS3 buttons and more styles will come up...

Important Instruction:

  • Install JA Typo Button Plugin for this to be seen in the Editor
  • You can use many types to load from a popup

Upgrade Method:

  1. You can install new version directly over this version. Uninstallation is not required. Backup any customized files before upgrading.
